content.prompt: All of the following developments in Song dynasty China were important factors in the accumulation of wealth outlined in the first paragraph EXCEPT

choices.label: increased Chinese involvement in the Indian Ocean trade
an increase in agricultural production in China
increased Chinese production of manufactured goods
an increase in technological innovations in China

topic.text: 1.1: Developments in East Asia from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
